item.title: Towards Multi-Domain Learning for Generalizable Video Anomaly Detection
item.description: Researchers propose Multi-Domain learning for Video Anomaly Detection (MDVAD) to create generalizable models handling conflicting abnormality criteria across diverse datasets, improving accuracy and a…
